repnme.cdata!:
Brazil’s public services get boost from
            better debt management

abstracts.cdata!:
Confronted by a large debt burden at the
            end of the 1990s, Brazil teamed with the International Bank
            for Reconstruction and Development (IBRD) and other
            financial specialists to craft a new approach to debt
            management that has not only yielded billions of dollars in
            savings in debt service payments, it also set a new
            foundation for economic strength that helped insulate Brazil
            from the severity of the global financial crisis. The
            savings that resulted from the IBRD-supported reforms are
            being used to broaden and increase the quality of public
            services across Brazil. The Bank is financing the completion
            of Brazil’s integrated debt system through supplementary
            finance added to the recently restructured and extended its
            operations. The Bank also continues to work with individual
            state governments to improve their debt management capacity.

docna.cdata!:
Mejor gestión de la deuda impulsa servicios
            públicos en Brasil

Brazil’s public services get
            boost from better debt management : Mejor gestión de la
            deuda impulsa servicios públicos en Brasil

repnme.cdata!:
Brazil's public services get welcome
            boost from better debt management

abstracts.cdata!:
Confronted by a large debt burden at the
            end of the 1990s, Brazil teamed with the IBRD and other
            financial specialists to craft a new approach to debt
            management that has not only yielded billions of dollars in
            savings in debt service payments, it also set a new
            foundation for economic strength that helped insulate Brazil
            from the severity of the global financial crisis. The
            savings that resulted from the IBRD supported reforms are
            being used to broaden and increase the quality of public
            services across Brazil.

Les services publics du Bresil obtiennent
            une relance bienvenue grace a une meilleure gestion de la dette
